property.description: Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

concept.definition: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a red combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one red combination found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a yellow combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one yellow combination found and no red combinations found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a green combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one green combination found and no red or yellow combinations found.

concept.display: no effective answer significance for answer and question combination
concept.definition: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that answer did not meet any answer significance conditions. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no answer met the conditions of any answer significance(s) in the related question.

designation.value: Ingen triageringsindikator for spørgsmål/svar-kombination har fundet anvendelse.

concept.display: no answer significance defined for question(s)
concept.definition: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that the question did not have any answer significance. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no question had any associated answer significance(s).

designation.value: Måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er ugyldiggjort
Ugyldiggørelse af måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er trukket tilbage

concept.definition: Deviation found suggesting possible deterioration of condition

designation.value: Der er fundet afvigelse, der tyder på at borgeren vil opleve forværring af sygdom eller tilstand

concept.definition: No deviation found suggesting possible deterioration of condition

designation.value: Der er ikke fundet afvigelse, der tyder på at borgeren vil opleve forværring af sygdom eller tilstand

concept.definition: Insufficient data for determining deviation suggesting possible deterioration of condition

designation.value: Utilstrækkelige data forhindrer bestemmelse af afvigelse, der tyder på at borgeren vil opleve forværring af sygdom eller tilstand
